pkgmetadata.longdescription: # elife-cleanerClean and transform article submission files into a consistent format## RequirementsInstall `imagemagick-dev` and `ghostscript` in order for `wand` Python module to open PDF files. Also, the imagemagick `policy.xml` file must be configured to allow reading of PDF files.## ConfigurationTo use a YAML file of assessment terms in the `asessment_terms.py` module, set the constant `ASSESSMENT_TERMS_YAML` in the module to be the path to the YAML file on disk. The sample file `assessment_terms.yaml` in the code repository is not distributed as part of the library.## LicenseLicensed under [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php).
